summary.name: Summary
summary.content:
• 10+ years designing Dynamics 365 CE/CRM and Power Platform solutions for federal agencies, including VA programs supporting millions of Veterans.

  • Architect enterprise integrations across Genesys Omnichannel, Azure App Services, SharePoint, and Dataverse to deliver secure, multi-channel case experiences.

  • Build managed/unmanaged solutions, Power Apps, Power Pages, and C#/.NET plugins that meet 508 compliance, performance, and security baselines.

  • Lead Agile DevSecOps teams from discovery through deployment, aligning stakeholders, translating requirements, and mentoring junior developers.

  • Hands-on with Power Automate, Power Fx, JavaScript, Liquid, Advanced Find, FetchXML, and XrmToolBox to extend Dynamics with minimal custom code.

  • Trusted advisor with active Public Trust eligibility; excels in remote collaboration, executive communication, and rapid troubleshooting.

items.summary:
• Principal architect for Dynamics 365 CE modernization at the Department of Veterans Affairs, delivering omnichannel case intake that connects Genesys Cloud, Power Apps, Power Pages, and SharePoint for secure document workflows.

  • Produced enterprise architecture views, interface specifications, and deployment runbooks covering Azure App Services, Dataverse, and legacy integrations to earn stakeholder approval and FedRAMP alignment.

  • Directed the build of managed/unmanaged solutions, model-driven apps, and custom C# plugins, introducing automated unit tests, Solution Checker gates, and code reviews to uphold quality.

  • Configured Business Units, Teams, and role-based security, plus Advanced Find/FetchXML-based monitoring to protect PII and enforce least-privilege access.

  • Orchestrated Power Automate flows, Azure Functions, and PowerShell scripts to normalize inbound data streams, improving reliability of 15+ integrations by 40%.

  • Led a distributed team of 7 developers, coaching junior engineers on XrmToolBox, liquid templating, and 508-compliant UI patterns within an Agile DevSecOps release cadence.

  • Resolved Sev1 production incidents within SLA by triaging telemetry, debugging plugin traces, and coordinating hotfix deployments through Azure DevOps pipelines.

• Owned Dynamics 365 CE architecture for a federal procurement portfolio, mapping integrations with Omnichannel Customer Service, Azure Service Bus, and secure SharePoint document libraries.

  • Delivered Power Apps portals and Canvas Apps that synchronized with Genesys Engage call flows, surfacing caller context, SLA timers, and case history in real time.

  • Developed reusable .NET plugins, custom workflow activities, and Liquid templates to enforce business rules before persisting data to Dataverse.

  • Instituted ALM governance—branching, solution layering, managed package promotion, and automated deployments via Azure DevOps—to support multi-environment releases.

  • Partnered with PMs, BAs, QA, and release managers within an Agile DevSecOps cadence, prioritizing backlog items from discovery through production deployments.

  • Led Section 508 audits and remediation for model-driven forms and portal pages, ensuring compliance and veteran-friendly UX.

• Implemented Dynamics 365 and Power Platform solutions for healthcare and infrastructure programs, emphasizing out-of-the-box configuration before introducing custom code.

  • Created Dataverse-based asset and service management models, Power Automate orchestrations, and Power BI telemetry that fed Azure Monitor dashboards.

  • Built custom connectors and RESTful APIs to interact with external CMDB, ERP, and ticketing systems while maintaining role-based access controls.

  • Crafted JavaScript, TypeScript, and Liquid customizations to enhance form UX, optimize field validations, and surface contextual guidance.

  • Documented architecture decisions, ERDs, and deployment guides to streamline handoffs across onshore/offshore delivery teams.

• Engineered Dynamics 365 entities, forms, and business process flows for federal contracting offices, mapping requirements with BAs and SMEs to align with procurement policies.

  • Wrote early C# plugins, custom workflow extensions, and JavaScript web resources to enforce validation logic and integrate with legacy SQL Server assets.

  • Administered security roles, field-level security, and Business Unit hierarchies to segregate duties across CONUS/OCO offices.

  • Automated ETL pipelines via SSIS, Azure SQL, and Power Automate to maintain inbound/outbound data streams and reduce manual reconciliation.

  • Maintained documentation, readiness checklists, and user training for nationwide rollouts; supported on-call rotations to resolve Tier-2 incidents.
